did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: McKinney Family Papers

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Papers of the McKinney Family from the McKinney Family Papers. Contains correspondence, notes, clippings, obituaries, business papers and ephemera.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The three parts of the McKinney Family papers are the Jean Webster Papers, the Samuel Clemens Papers and the McKinney Family Papers. The common thread amongst these groups of materials is Jean Webster. She was the grand niece of Samuel Clemens, and became part of the McKinney Family when she married Glenn Ford McKinney (see the McKinney chart below).

Glenn Ford McKinney was the son of John Luke McKinney (co-founder of Standard Oil) and Ida DeEtte Ford. Ida and John also had a daughter, Ethelyn McKinney, a member of the Smith College Class of 1895.

chronitem.event: James McKinney (one of John and Rebecca's eight children) born
James McKinney married Lydia Drury Turner
John Luke McKinney (son of James and Lydia) born in Pittsfield, PA
John Luke McKinney married Ida DeEtte Ford (daughter of John C. Ford and Jerusha Jane Dalrymple)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The McKinney Family Papers include correspondence, photographs, legal papers, ephemera and genealogical papers for members of the McKinney and related families. The collection also includes some family photographs, notably of Samuel Langhorne Clemens.
The McKinney Family Papers form only one part of the McKinney Family Papers.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Materials
separatedmaterial.p: Materials related to Samuel Clemens and Jean Webster have been separated from this collection and grouped into their respective collections:

odd.head: Note
odd.p: Forms part of the McKinney Family Papers.

odd.head: Encoding Information
odd.p: Finding aid encoded by Jason Kovari, 26 February 2009. Updated by Emma Gronbeck, March 2024.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Collection processed by Archives and Special Collections Library Staff.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Included in the gift of the Jean Webster McKinney Family Papers, given to the college in 1977 by Jean Connor, Jean Webster's daughter, and her husband, Ralph Connor.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: The McKinney Family Papers, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.
